sense.gloss: to eat, to drink, to wolf, to knock back
to be on the receiving end (of something undesirable), to undergo (trouble)

sdata.j: ↑銀行↑↓ぎんこう↓↑強盗↑↓ごうとう↓すると↑懲役↑↓ちょうえき↓↑１０↑↓じゅう↓↑年|↑↓ねん↓↑食↑↓く↓らう|ぞ。
sdata.e: Bank robbery will cost you ten years in prison.

sdata.j: あの↑声↑↓こえ↓で↑蜥蜴|↑↓とかげ↓↑食↑↓く↓らう|か↑時鳥↑↓ほととぎす↓。
sdata.e: Don't judge a book by its cover.
